== Main Inclusion Report for gartoon ==

# ''Availability:'' The package is available in ubuntu universe, arch: all
# ''Rationale:'' The package is the desired default icon theme for the Edubuntu desktop
# ''Security:'' 
** No CVEs or other security issues
** Just icons, nothing security relevant.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''  
** Needs no setup after install
** No <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/gartoon|Debbugs]]</nowiki> 
 0. ''Standards compliance:''
** The package meets the FHS.
** Lots of control files contain doubled contents (debian/compat, debian/prerm, etc.)
** prerm performs unconditional `rm -f`, operation needs to be checked (`$1 == purge` and the like)
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** all in main already
